title: Official Blind Review #1
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I read the paper at least twice and used my best judgement in assessing the paper.
review:
In this manuscript, authors improve the work in [1] by simplifying the reverse-discretization function. The empirical study demonstrates the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm.
I’m not familiar with the area. The differences between this work and [1] should be elaborated more in the related work, since they are closely related.
Besides, for the technical part, DPQ-SX outperforms DPQ-VQ while the softmax approximation seems identical to that developed in [1].

[1] ICML’18: Learning K-way D-dimensional Discrete Codes for Compact Embedding Representations
